–ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏ –†–ï–î–ê–ö–¢–ò–†–û–í–ê–ù–ò–ï –∫–∞—Ä—Ç–∏–Ω–æ–∫.

‚Ä¢ Architectural Features: Native Multimodality, Deep Alignment
‚àò Native Multimodal Architecture: Adopts a new, unified framework for both understanding and generation, flexibly supporting the input and output of text, images, video, and audio.
‚àò Joint Multimodal Training: Achieves stronger modal alignment by jointly training on text, audio, and visual data‚Äîkey to enabling audio-visual sync and greatly improved instruction following.
‚àò Human Preference Alignment: Implements Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) to continuously align with human preferences, enhancing image quality and video dynamics.

‚Ä¢ Video Capabilities: A/V Synchronization, Cinematic Quality
‚àò Synchronized A/V Generation: Natively supports high-fidelity, high-consistency video generation with synchronized audio, including multi-person vocals, sound effects, and BGM.
‚àò Controllable Multimodal Input: Supports text, images, and audio as input sources for limitless creativity.
‚àò Cinematic Aesthetics: Features powerful dynamics and structural stability with an upgraded cinematic control system, generating 1080p HD 10s videos of cinematic quality.

‚Ä¢ Image Capabilities: Creative & Precise Control
‚àò Advanced Image Generation: Greatly improved instruction following to support photorealistic quality, diverse artistic styles, creative typography, and professional-grade charts.
‚àò Image Editing: Supports conversational, instruction-based image editing and pixel-level precision for tasks like multi-concept fusion, material transformation, and product color swapping, and more.
